definition: to auction/auction sale/to sell at a reduced price
to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt

sentences.english: Limousin bulls stand at a cattle auction in Gross Kreutz, Germany.
sentences.chinese: 利木贊牛站在一個家畜拍賣上，大克羅伊茨，德國。

sentences.english: The ratio of commissions to be collected shall be set in accordance with the principle of making an inverse ratio to the auction completion price.
sentences.chinese: 收取佣金的比例按照同拍賣成交價成反比的原則確定。

sentences.english: He put his possessions up for auction.
sentences.chinese: 他把他的財產拿出來拍賣。

sentences.english: The hexagonal pot shown in this picture is painted with five-colors and was put to auction at Sotheby's in the Netherlands.
sentences.chinese: 畫上五色彩的六角盆圖片在荷蘭的蘇富比拍賣。

sentences.english: The auctioneer's services are paid for in the form of …
sentences.chinese: 提示了這一段講的是拍賣人所得的利潤。

sentences.english: But small auctions can lead to low winning bids, and thus less profit.
sentences.chinese: 此外，小型拍賣會導致中標價過低，利潤從而減少。

sentences.english: I shall sell my house by auction.
sentences.chinese: 那楝房子在拍賣時以很低價賣出。

sentences.english: What's the difference between the way Buy It Now and auction items are sorted in search results?
sentences.chinese: 在搜索結果中一口價和拍賣格式的排序有什麼區別？

sentences.english: This painting came under the hammer at Christies today.
sentences.chinese: 這幅畫今天由克里斯蒂拍賣行拍賣了。

sentences.english: This painting came under the hammer at Christies today.
sentences.chinese: 這幅畫今天由克里斯蒂拍賣行拍賣了。

sentences.english: But Sotheby's argued that it would likely have ended up on the mainland even if it went to auction.
sentences.chinese: 但蘇富比認爲即使進行拍賣它也可能留在中國大陸。

sentences.english: The department store is selling off its summer stock.
sentences.chinese: 這家百貨公司正在舉行夏季商品大拍賣。

sentences.english: They're sending all of us to auctioneering class.
sentences.chinese: 他們要送我們全部人去拍賣課。

sentences.english: An auction of Greek 6-month government debt was also given a lukewarm reception this morning.
sentences.chinese: 希臘今晨拍賣的6個月政府債券也遇冷。

sentences.english: The painting was bid in at the sale.
sentences.chinese: 在拍賣中畫主自己以高價買下。

sentences.english: I bought this shirt in a sale.
sentences.chinese: 我這件襯衫是拍賣時買的。

definition: sale price/negotiated price/price reached in an auction
to consult a reference/to refer to (another document)
Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
to exhibit at or take part in a trade show etc
